DOC.detailed_description: - A questionnaire study investigate patient satisfaction 8-14 year dental implant therapy study complication influence degree satisfaction/quality life . The questionnaire send 587 patient treat The Specialist Clinic Skanstull . - A clinical examination minimum 150 patient answered questionnaire perform : - study incidence biological technical complication dental implant minimum 10 year function . - study survival rate implant patient level degree bone loss remain teeth implant . In addition , correlation bone loss remain teeth bone loss implant study . - sample take gingival crevicular fluid investigate profile cytokine bone resorption marker well study intra-individual correlation cytokine bone marker gingival crevicular fluid sit peri-implantitis periodontal defect individual dental implant . - addition , salivary cytokine bone resorption marker analyze order identify disease-specific biomarkers well study correlation cytokine/bone resorption marker saliva gingival/peri-implant crevicular fluid . - To identify significant risk factor risk predictor incidence peri-implantitis .
